0.39.name: wordpress/simple-weather
0.39.description:
Shows current weather for specified location. Makes use of "secret" Google Weather API, which is unofficial, yet XML-based and lightweight, and is used by developers quite often. The plugin uses cURL, so works even on hosts with some security restricions, like url-disabled file_get_contents.
If you've downloaded it, consider leaving feedback in my guestbook, it's rather important for me. Thanks.
